summary: Emirates is a major airline based in Dubai, United Arab Emirates. It's the biggest airline in the Middle East, flying to over 150 cities worldwide with nearly 250 planes. Started in 1985 with help from Dubai's royal family, it quickly grew and now leads in Airbus A380 and Boeing 777 planes. It operates from Terminal 3 at Dubai International Airport and is known for its independent operations without government subsidies.
title: Emirates (airline)
